All the reviews that tell you to jump right in are on target.  A bit crowded, but make your way to the bar for great Cava.  We tried glasses of most types, and liked the naturale the best - although many were drinking the rose.  The food is simple.  Jamon, cheese, bread - both hot and cold versions.  Lots of local and European sausages.  Simple food, lots of inexpensive Cava, great atmosphere.  Kind of like the McSorleys of Barcelona.  Awesome.
